title: User Registration via Clerk Authentication
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully using Clerk authentication and that user data syncs to the Convex database.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in valid registration information (email, password, etc.).
Submit the registration form.
Confirm user registration success message is displayed.
Verify that the new user record is synchronized in the Convex database.

title: Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can login successfully using Clerk authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered user email and password.
Click the login button.
Ensure the user is redirected to the homepage or user dashboard.
Check that authentication tokens are set and persisted.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure login fails gracefully when incorrect username/email or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid user email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that a descriptive login error message is shown.
Confirm user is not authenticated and remains on login page.

title: Password Reset Workflow
description: Validate the password reset flow allowing users to request reset, receive email, and set new password.

steps.description: Navigate to the reset password page.
Submit registered email for password reset.
Verify confirmation message that reset email has been sent.
Use reset link from email to navigate to new password page.
Input and confirm a new valid password.
Submit new password form.
Ensure password reset success message is displayed.
Login using the updated password to confirm update.
Verify login success with new password.

title: Multi-language Support and UI Localization
description: Verify that the UI displays correctly and translates based on selected languages via i18next integration.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage.
Switch language to each supported language (e.g., English, Spanish, French).
Check all major UI texts are translated correctly.
Verify currency localization changes correspondingly.
Confirm no UI layout breaks or overlaps occur with different languages.

title: Beat Catalog Filtering and Search Operations
description: Test filtering by genre, BPM, price, and search to return accurate and consistent beat listings.

steps.description: Open the beats marketplace page.
Apply a filter for a specific genre.
Verify the displayed beats match the selected genre.
Apply a BPM filter range.
Check displayed beats fall within the BPM range.
Apply a price filter.
Ensure only beats within the price filter are shown.
Use search input to query beats by keyword.
Validate that search results are relevant to the query.
Combine multiple filters and search.
Confirm results reflect all filter criteria correctly.

title: Audio Player Waveform Playback Controls
description: Validate audio waveform player supports playback, pause, seeking, volume control, and persistent playback across navigation.

steps.description: Navigate to a beat's details page.
Start playback using waveform player controls.
Verify audio plays and waveform animation is visible.
Pause the audio and confirm playback halts.
Seek to a different position in the waveform by clicking/dragging.
Verify audio resumes from the seeked position.
Adjust the volume and check volume changes accordingly.
Navigate to another page while audio is playing.
Ensure playback persists continuously with global audio player controls present.
Test audio playback controls on mobile devices using touch gestures.
Confirm responsive touch controls work without lag or errors.

title: Add Beat to Cart and Cart Persistence
description: Verify users can add beats to the shopping cart, update quantities, and that the cart persists across sessions.

steps.description: From a beat's product page, select license options if applicable.
Click 'Add to Cart' button.
Confirm beat is added to the cart with correct license and price.
Navigate to the cart page.
Update the quantity of the beat.
Verify that the cart updates totals and quantities correctly.
Close browser/tab, reopen, and log back into the account.
Ensure the cart contents persist after session restore.

title: Checkout Process for Guest and Authenticated Users
description: Test the end-to-end checkout flow for both guest users and logged-in users including payment processing and order confirmation.

steps.description: As a guest user, add one or more beats to the cart.
Proceed to checkout.
Input required billing and shipping information.
Complete payment using Clerk Billing system.
Verify payment success page is shown and order confirmation is sent.
Repeat steps as an authenticated user.
Confirm order appears in user dashboard order history.

title: Subscription Plans Activation and Quota Management
description: Validate subscription plans can be activated, billing is processed correctly, and usage quotas reflect subscription level.

steps.description: Login as a registered user.
Navigate to subscription management page.
Select and subscribe to a Basic, Artist, or Ultimate plan.
Verify payment is processed and subscription status updates to active.
Check usage quotas and benefits in the user dashboard.
Confirm quotas correspond accurately to the subscribed plan.
Simulate quota limits reached and verify correct UI warnings.

title: Service Booking Form Submission
description: Ensure users can book mixing, mastering, recording sessions, and custom beats requests successfully with validation and confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the service booking page (mixing/mastering/recording/custom beats).
Fill out booking form with valid inputs including date, time, and service details.
Submit the booking form.
Confirm that a booking confirmation message and email are received.
Submit form with invalid or missing required fields.
Verify validation errors are displayed and form submission is prevented.

title: Favorites and Wishlist Management
description: Verify that users can add and remove beats from favorites and wishlist, and that recently viewed beats are tracked and displayed.

steps.description: As a logged-in user, navigate to a beatâ€™s page and click 'Add to Favorites'.
Check that beat appears in Favorites list.
Navigate to Wishlist page and add/remove beats.
Verify wishlist updates accordingly.
View several beats sequentially.
Confirm recently viewed beats display updates in correct order.

title: Responsive Layout Across Devices
description: Check that the entire application UI renders and functions correctly across breakpoints from 320px up to 2560px resolution.

steps.description: Open the app on various device widths or resize browser window (mobile, tablet, desktop, ultrawide).
Verify navigation menus adapt (e.g., hamburger menu on mobile).
Ensure that all UI components scale and reorganize appropriately without overlap or truncation.
Test critical user flows (e.g., adding to cart, playing audio) function correctly at all breakpoints.

title: Accessibility Compliance Validation
description: Perform automated and manual testing to verify WCAG 2.1 AA standards compliance across the application.

steps.description: Run automated accessibility scans (e.g., axe-core) on key pages: homepage, beat product, checkout, dashboard.
Confirm no critical or high severity accessibility violations exist.
Manually test keyboard navigation of all interactive elements.
Ensure logical tab order and focus visible on all focusable elements.
Check screen reader output for meaningful labels and roles on important UI.
Verify all informative images and icons have alt text or are marked decorative.

title: Security - Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Prevention
description: Verify that no user input or dynamic content leads to JavaScript injection vulnerabilities.

steps.description: Attempt to input JavaScript payloads into common input fields such as search, booking forms, profile updates.
Confirm that scripts are sanitized or rendered as plain text with no execution.

title: Security - Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Protection
description: Validate that protected endpoints require valid tokens and reject unauthorized requests.

steps.description: Make POST requests to protected APIs without CSRF tokens.
Verify that requests are denied with an appropriate error.
Repeat with valid CSRF tokens.
Confirm requests succeed as expected.

title: Performance Benchmark - Page Load and Interaction
description: Test key pages meet performance targets: Lighthouse score >90, First Contentful Paint <2 seconds, and UI maintains 60fps.

steps.description: Load homepage, beats shop, and product detail pages on standard network and device conditions.
Using Lighthouse or equivalent tools, verify performance score is at least 90.
Confirm First Contentful Paint time is under 2 seconds.
Interact with UI elements and scroll continuously.
Verify animations and interactions run smoothly at 60fps.

title: Error Handling on Payment Failure
description: Ensure that payment failures are handled gracefully with clear user feedback and no unhandled errors.

steps.description: Attempt checkout with Clerk Billing and simulate payment failure (e.g., card declined).
Verify payment error page or modal is displayed with appropriate error message.
Ensure the user can retry or return to cart without app crashes.

title: Admin Panel - Content and User Management
description: Verify admin users can access the admin panel to manage users and content, and that changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the admin dashboard.
Edit user records and content files.
Confirm changes are saved and reflected in the system.
Test synchronization dashboard functionality.
Verify no unhandled errors occur during sync.

title: Loyalty and Rewards Program Transaction History
description: Validate that loyalty points and rewards transaction histories are accurately tracked and displayed to users.

steps.description: Login as a user who has loyalty program activity.
Access the loyalty rewards page or section.
Verify all transactions are correctly listed with accurate point values and timestamps.
Redeem points or rewards if applicable.
Confirm reward redemption updates transaction history accordingly.
